user_device_rel: n people to m devices; 1 person to n devices
device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table); Mounted to wall
scale: Near, personal space; Social space; Room

contribution_desc: XDSession - a framework for cross-device application development based on a concept of cross-device sessions, not only useful for managing distribution and synchronisation, but also for logging and debugging.
